strings.affinity:
Let us take a break for today.
And it's not much,
but I got this for you.
strings.description: A white magic expert born into the community of researchers that would one day become Mysidia. Roselia immersed herself in magical research simply because she was good at it. However, when a plague struck and she was unable to cure her fellow researchers, she became profoundly aware of her limitations.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm. My magic powers grow...
It seems that visions do not require training to gain strength...
strings.summon:
Are you the one who summoned me?
You need my healing magic?
I shall do as you ask.

strings.evolution:
I am definitely different now.
Stronger down to the core.
This is incredible!
strings.affinity:
Let us take a break for today.
And it's not much,
but I got this for you.
strings.description: A white mage from the land that would come to be known as Mysidia. Due to her father's influence, she never developed a healer's compassion and was interested only in research for its own sake. Only as she succumbed to the plague ravaging her homeland did she begin to regret her unfeeling approach to white magic, so she carries that regret beyond death, as a vision.
strings.fusion: If I had been this powerful while I was alive, I could have saved so many...
strings.summon:
I was only a researcher of magic.
But now, I am your ally.
Show me your wounded, and I will heal them.

strings.evolution:
Healing powers and a compassionate heart...
I think I am a much better healer now!
strings.affinity:
Let us take a break for today.
And it's not much,
but I got this for you.
strings.description: A white mage from the land that would come to be known as Mysidia. She returned as a vision, filled with piercing devotion after failing to heal herself and others with her white magic. Thrilled to be back again, she enjoys the cold snowy season clad in red, lifting spirits and bringing smiles to peoples faces with her gentle healing.
strings.fusion:
I am full of healing power!
I can protect you with this!
strings.summon:
It is my hope to keep
you and your allies healthy.
This cloth is a sign of that.
